body.pre:
<?xml version="1.0" standalone="no" ?> <!DOCTYPE music SYSTEM "music.dtd" > <music> <songs> <song sid="s1" time="Mar" year="2000"> <title>song1</title> <artist>artist1</artist> <composers> <composer>composer1</composer> <composer>composer2</composer> </composers> <album>album1</album> </song>
<song sid="s2" time="Jan" year="1998"> <title>song2</title> <artist>artist2</artist> <composers> <composer>composer1</composer> </composers> </song>
<song sid="s3" time="Oct" year="2013"> <title>song3</title> <artist>artist2</artist> <composers> <composer>composer2</composer> </composers> </song>
<song sid="s4" time="Dec" year="2008"> <title>song4</title> <artist>artist3</artist> <composers> <composer>composer2</composer> <composer>composer3</composer> </composers> </song>
</songs> <playlists> <playlist pid="p1" creator="u1"> <track sid="s1"/> </playlist>
<playlist pid="p2" creator="u1"> <track sid="s1"/> <track sid="s2"/> </playlist>
<playlist pid="p3" > <track sid="s3"/> <track sid="s2"/> </playlist>
<playlist pid="p4" > <track sid="s2"/> </playlist>
<playlist pid="p5" > <track sid="s2"/> </playlist>
<playlist pid="p6" > <track sid="s1"/> <track sid="s2"/> <track sid="s3"/> </playlist> </playlists> </music>
